title: Private Health Screening
tagline: Reassurance in a single morning at our Marylebone clinic.
description: Comprehensive blood work, ECG, lung function, and lifestyle coaching inspired by the popular screening packages on drsnaclinic.com.
longDescription: We dedicate up to two hours to understanding your body from the inside out. Expect consultant-level attention, luxurious surroundings, and a written roadmap that translates your data into action.

seo.metaTitle: Private Health Screening London | Comprehensive Medicals | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Book male or female private health checks with blood tests, cardiac screening, and lifestyle coaching in Marylebone.

hero.headline: Health Screening Marylebone
hero.subheadline: Same trusted assessments from our legacy site—now with even richer biomarker panels.

overview.title: What the Screening Includes
overview.content: Full medical history, vitals, BMI, ECG, spirometry, urinalysis, 40+ blood markers (lipids, hormones, thyroid, vitamins, diabetes risk), and optional cancer markers. We also include a lifestyle debrief with nutrition and stress guidance.
highlights: Consultant GP for the entire appointment
Digital and printed report within 2 working days

benefits.title: Pre-Visit Concierge
benefits.description: We arrange fasting instructions, any add-on scans, and chauffeur bookings.

benefits.title: In-Clinic Assessment
benefits.description: Our nurse and GP guide you through tests with minimal waiting.

benefits.title: Results & Renewal Plan
benefits.description: Receive personalised recommendations, supplement plans, and follow-up reminders.

benefits.title: Why Patients Book Year After Year

items.title: Peace of mind
items.description: Catch trends before they become symptoms.

items.title: Actionable plans
items.description: Nutrition, sleep, and fitness advice tailored to your pressure-filled routine.

items.title: Direct referrals
items.description: Rapid access to cardiology, imaging, or specialists if anything abnormal appears.

faq.question: Do I need to fast?
faq.answer: Yes, we will advise on fasting and medication guidance during booking.

faq.question: Can I add imaging?
faq.answer: Absolutely—add whole body MRI, CT calcium scoring, or ultrasound on the same day.

faq.question: Is there a corporate package?
faq.answer: We provide bespoke packages for executives and corporate teams upon request.

cta.title: Reserve Your Health Screening
cta.subtitle: Limited slots each morning to guarantee privacy and attention.
